Genetics may play a role in causing the condition. A defect in one or more genes might prevent the ductus arteriosus from closing after birth.",NHLBI,Patent Ductus Arteriosus
Who is at risk for Patent Ductus Arteriosus? ?,"Patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) is a relatively common congenital heart defect in the United States.
